articles.title: Amazon's AWS Chief Criticizes Team for Delayed Product Launches
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is planning to launch new products at its Reinvent event.  Matt Garman, a top executive at AWS, urged employees to accelerate product launches to capitalize on customer excitement. AWS is internally testing a new AI product called Quick, which is an 'agentic' AI designed to improve productivity by analyzing documents and automating workflows.

articles.title: ChatGPT develops a Pulse
articles.author: Casey Newton
articles.summary: OpenAI is testing a new ChatGPT feature called 'Pulse' that proactively researches and delivers personalized updates based on user chats, feedback, and connected apps. Pulse aims to provide a more useful ChatGPT experience by continuously working in the background and offering curated insights and updates, with plans for wider availability after initial testing.

articles.title: 33 Comfortable Walking Shoes Backed By Reviews
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Blondo introduces waterproof Villa ankle booties. Crocs offers fashionable and comfortable flip-flops. Dr. Martens presents comfy and rock 'n' roll gladiator sandals. Toms provides versatile sandals. Portland Gear releases water-resistant bags and accessories designed to air dry. Skechers launches USA Uno Stand On Airs, offering a comfortable walking experience. Reef introduces two-strap sandals designed for high energy rebound.

articles.title: Jordan Brand Goes Outdoors With New Trunner And Cold-Weather Gear
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Jordan Brand launched the Trunner O/S performance sneakers and all-weather AJ1 Element Low as seasonal drops. These new products are part of the Mountainside and RealTree Camo collections.

articles.title: Depict AI's New Search Tool Wants to Help Consumers Shop With Intention
articles.author: Hikmat Mohammed
articles.summary: Depict AI launched GPT Search, a new e-commerce tool designed to help shoppers and brands consume more considerately. GPT Search is being adapted by Sandqvist, CDLP, Nanushka and Luca Faloni and takes on each respective brand's tone of voice, which allows up to 40 words in its search engine. Its special features include excluding items that may be out of stock or not stocked in the region, as well as taking into consideration the season and if the brand is boosting any campaigns.

articles.title: New Chick-fil-A opening on Barrett Parkway
articles.author: Staff reports
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is opening a new location on Barrett Parkway by Powder Springs Rd. Doors will officially open on October 2nd.

articles.title: Amazon's AWS CEO chides staff for slow product rollouts
articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services' executive emphasized the importance of launching new products and services at the Reinvent customer event, rather than just pre-announcing them. The company showcased its Nova chatbot at last year's event, and there is a push to deliver on the product roadmap and have over 60,000 attendees.

articles.title: I tested the supermarket stouts and there's only ONE that's as good as Guinness
articles.author: Helena Nicklin
articles.summary: Aldi launched Mulligan's Stout, positioning it as a premium, lower-priced alternative to Guinness.  Brewdog Black Heart is presented as a cheaper, accomplished alternative to Guinness. Several other stouts are compared, including Fuller's Black Cab Stout, Mackeson Stout, Camden Stout, Supermalt Stout, and London Porter Dark Beer, with a focus on their flavor profiles, price points, and overall appeal.

articles.title: Nike Presents the Shox Z
articles.summary: Nike launched the Shox Z sneaker in China and plans a global launch later this year. The new model balances elegance and sportstyle. The expected price point is $140 USD.

articles.title: GTA 6 clone entertains with simple and free gameplay in the browser
articles.author: Bruna
articles.summary: An enthusiast developed and released "GTA New York", a free-to-play game inspired by Rockstar Games' Grand Theft Auto franchise. The game runs directly in the browser and offers a simplified experience, with action, exploration, and driving within a 3D environment mimicking New York's streets. It is available on the Click Jogos website.

articles.title: DYAVOL, Now on Netflix: Aryans Brainchild Finds a Spot in The Ba***ds of Bollywood
articles.author: Aryan Khan’s
articles.summary: Radico Khaitan invested Rs 40 crore for a 47.5 per cent stake in D'YAVOL Spirits, becoming the largest shareholder. This collaboration with Zerodha's Nikhil Kamath, Aryan and Shah Rukh Khan will expand the scale and distribution of the luxury liquor brand D'YAVOL.

articles.title: Kai Trump Launches New Product Line Straight From White House
articles.author: Leena Nasir
articles.summary: Kai Trump, Donald Trump's eldest granddaughter, launched her own clothing line featuring autographed casual wear. The collection aims to offer versatile and modern pieces designed to be a staple, not just merchandise. She showcased her collection using the White House as a backdrop.

articles.title: Frost & Sullivan Ranks Ulanzi No. 1 Worldwide by Sales Volume in Photography Accessories (2024)
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: Shenzhen Vijim Technology Co.'s Ulanzi brand is ranked No. 1 worldwide in photography accessories. Vijim Technology's user co-creation model has led to the development of new products like the Claw Quick-Release System and Gear Tree, co-created with users on platforms like Bilibili and professional filmmakers. Ulanzi serves independent content creators with user-driven innovation, while FALCAM focuses on original design and addresses professional users.

articles.title: 34 Products With Such Impressive Results That Oops, You Might Get A Little Bit Of A God Complex Using Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing or updating their products. Mario Badescu is offering the Drying Lotion for acne care, while Gold Bond presents a firming neck and chest cream. The Pink Stuff launches its new Sqeezy sponge set for cleaning, and Eos introduces Cashmere Vanilla Cashmere Whipped Oil Body Butter.

articles.title: Introducing TD SYNNEX PartnerFirst, a Unified Digital Portal for Enhanced Partner Experience
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: TD SYNNEX launched PartnerFirst, a unified global framework with regional customization. PartnerFirst is designed to simplify processes and support partners by integrating people, platforms, and services. It includes features such as a centralized dashboard, intelligent search functionality, and personalized recommendations.

articles.title: Record Growth For 9.9 Mega Brands Sale, LazMall AOV Grows 10 Pct
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Lazada Malaysia achieved record-breaking performance in its 9.9 Mega Brands Sale. The AI assistant 'Lazzie' played a central role, boosting a 53% increase in interactions, a 34% rise in shopper-initiated chats in Malaysia, and a 36% uplift in orders compared to the 6.6 event.

articles.title: Smoked salmon brand targets ready-to-eat space at US retail
articles.author: Rachel Sapin
articles.summary: Echo Falls introduced a new product, salmon caviar, targeting the ready-to-eat seafood market in US retail. This launch expands Echo Falls' product line and caters to consumer demand for convenient seafood options.

articles.title: Olipop CEO: If I had to start over in my career, I'd prioritize this skillset above all others—it's not AI
articles.author: Ashton Jackson
articles.summary: Olipop, a prebiotic soda brand, was launched in 2018 by Ben Goodwin and David Lester as a healthier alternative to sugary drinks. Smarter by CNBC Make It launched a new online course, How To Start A Business: For First-Time Founders, with an introductory discount valid from September 16 through September 30, 2025.

articles.title: Olipop CEO: If I had to start over in my career, I'd prioritize this skillset above all others—it's not AI
articles.author: Ashton Jackson
articles.summary: Olipop, a prebiotic soda brand, was launched in 2018 by Ben Goodwin and David Lester as a healthier alternative to sugary drinks. The company generated $852,000 in gross revenue in its first year and was valued at $1.85 billion by February 2025 after a Series C funding round.

articles.title: AI brings audience relevance back to life
articles.author: Jim Caruso
articles.summary: O'Neill Wines adopted a behavior-led approach using real-time audience insights, which resulted in a 200% lift in cost per engagement for paid media. Spotify personalizes listening experiences by analyzing listener preferences, while Netflix analyzes viewing habits to tailor content suggestions, both enhancing consumer engagement and loyalty.

articles.title: These are the 3 best beauty products we tried this week
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: U Beauty has launched a new serum, a thick formula that acts as a soothing salve providing an instant glass-like effect and improving skin texture with continued use. Nuxe introduced Hair Prodigieux Le Lait, a leave-in hair conditioning spray with quinoa extract and fermented pink camellia oil, designed to nourish hair without weighing it down while also protecting from heat damage.

articles.title: South Korea's Natural Nine Targets Global Expansion With New Skincare Product
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Natural Nine, a South Korean healthcare and beauty specialist, is launching a new product to expand its global reach. The new offering is a foam-type cleanser designed to reduce skin irritation and avoid strong fragrances, building upon the company's reputation for innovative products like Leoclean male cleanser and deodorant.

articles.title: Connectmind AI Announces Launch of Synthetic Consumer Strategy Platform
articles.summary: Connectmind AI launched its platform that allows companies to simulate interviews and focus groups utilizing AI-driven personas derived from market data. The platform enables real-time insight generation and strategy testing, offering modules such as AI Strategist, Mind Partner, and Ideation to translate consumer responses into strategic decisions.

articles.title: Natural Nine Accelerates Global Expansion with Upcoming Product Launch
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Natural Nine, a healthcare and beauty specialist, plans to accelerate its global market entry. The company will introduce a new product to expand its portfolio, targeting a broader consumer base. They previously launched the Leoclean male cleanser and Leoclean Deodorant.

articles.title: OLUX launches AI-driven clean beauty platforms from Sharjah
articles.author: Sharjah 24: OLUX
articles.summary: OLUX has launched new digital platforms in the GCC region allowing customers to explore and purchase its products. These platforms also feature educational content, promoting awareness around sustainable beauty, health, and expert skincare advice. The company offers AI-powered skin analysis and personalized recommendations.

articles.title: Where to Buy Ganni's New Balance 1906L Loafer
articles.summary: Ganni has released its version of the New Balance 1906L loafer, featuring a yellow snakeskin print, glossy leather overlays, and silver accents. The Ganni x New Balance 1906L is available now at Ganni.com for $190, with a wider release scheduled for Sept. 30 at Newbalance.com and select retailers.

articles.title: Aldi's Brands Are Getting a Makeover—Here's What Shoppers Should Know
articles.author: Shay Trotter
articles.summary: Aldi is launching its first namesake brand and redesigning the packaging of its private-label products to clearly indicate their exclusivity to the store. The redesign includes an 'Aldi endorsement' stamp for some products and the new 'Aldi brand' label for others. The rollout is expected to take a few years, aiming to modernize the shopping experience and make it easier for customers to identify Aldi's budget-friendly favorites.

articles.title: Sahat Almajd issues prospectus for Nomu IPO
articles.author: Argaam
articles.summary: Sahat Almajd Trading Co. produces and sells premium chocolates under the 'Hanoverin' brand, baked goods and pastries through 'Suzam', specialty coffee under the 'Jadeel Coffee' brand, and markets 'Spark' carbonated beverages. These activities are part of the company's profile as it prepares for its IPO on the Nomu - Parallel Market.

articles.title: Exploring different Telegram Apps and Clients for Android
articles.summary: Several alternative Telegram clients offer unique features and functionalities. Nicegram focuses on user control, Plus Messenger provides deep customization, Telegram X offers a minimalist design, Nekogram X prioritizes privacy, BGram integrates utility tools, and Vidogram enhances multimedia options, demonstrating the diverse ways developers adapt Telegram for different user needs.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 announced with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5: Design, specs and launch date to ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its new flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15. It features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Mobile Platform and the company's DetailMax image engine. Qualcomm Technologies, Inc. developed the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Mobile Platform.

articles.title: LG's new TV is designed to be easier for seniors to use
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: LG is launching the LG Easy TV in South Korea, a new smart TV designed for elderly users. The TV features a simplified interface, tailored picture and sound adjustments, a redesigned remote, and plans for expansion to other markets.

articles.title: Progressive Web Apps, PWAs, Go Offline and Back - A Tomorrow Report by Digital Silk Development Agency
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Digital Silk published a report forecasting the expansion of Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) in 2025. The report highlights enhanced features like offline-first functionality, deeper system integration, and cross-platform consistency. According to the report, these advancements will transform how businesses deliver digital experiences.

articles.title: This Popular Yogurt Brand Is Giving Away Free Cups of Their Cold Brew Flavor For National Coffee Day-Here's the Easy Way to Get One
articles.author: Kelly Bryant
articles.summary: Icelandic Provisions is giving away free cups of their Cold Brew Coffee skyr on National Coffee Day. To receive the free cup, customers must sign up on the Icelandic Provisions website, purchase a 4.4 ounce cup of the skyr, and then text the company a photo of their receipt for reimbursement via Venmo or PayPal.

articles.title: Malaysia's AI and innovation boosters
articles.summary: The Malaysian government, through initiatives like the National Technology and Innovation Sandbox (NTIS) and the MRANTI AI Sandbox, is supporting the development and commercialization of new technologies by Malaysian startups and innovators. Funding and support are available through programs such as Malaysia Commercialisation Year (MCY), MYStartup Single Window, and Cradle grants, designed to help companies bring new products and services to market, including AI solutions in sectors like energy, agriculture, and healthcare.

articles.title: When It Comes to Building a Fragrance Wardrobe, S.S.K. Labs Proves Less Is More
articles.author: Kayla Greaves
articles.summary: S.S.K. Labs launched Fragrance Kit 01, featuring AM – Edp (Signature) eau de parfum, AM – O (Tonka), and AM – O (Myrrh) perfume oils. The kit offers a 'scent wardrobe,' allowing users to create up to seven unique combinations and develop a personal relationship with fragrance. This approach aims to provide a versatile and educational fragrance experience.

articles.title: Google DeepMind unveils new robotics AI model that can sort laundry 谷歌DeepMind发布可分类衣物的新型机器人AI模型
articles.author: 梅丽莎•海基拉
articles.summary: Google DeepMind has introduced new artificial intelligence models aimed at enhancing reasoning capabilities in robotics. These AI models enable robots to tackle more complex real-world tasks, such as sorting laundry and recycling rubbish.

articles.title: I paired my iPhone 17 Pro Max with this mobile accessory for an instant camera upgrade
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Insta360 launched a new gimbal. The gimbal offers superb stabilization and is recommended for creators.

articles.title: This Perfume Is My Sexy New Secret Weapon – But Not For The Reason You Think
articles.summary: Amorecco has introduced Late Night Gelato, a lickable perfume with vanilla and toasted coconut notes. The perfume is available in 15ml and 50ml sizes and is designed to be spritzed on the skin and tasted.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Carpet Cleaning Tool for Vehicles (TRO-1414)
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: An inventor has created the 'CARPET CUP,' a patent-pending invention designed for improved deep carpet cleaning in vehicles. This tool extracts deep dirt and debris, saving time and effort compared to surface cleaning. The design is currently available for licensing or sale through InventHelp.

articles.title: Tesco and Sainsbury's cut price of Terry's Chocolate Orange Bailey's
articles.summary: Sainsbury's is launching Terry's Chocolate Orange Baileys, a new flavor of Baileys Irish Cream, described as a combination of chocolate and orange. Morrisons also unveiled 'The Best Signature Collection', a Christmas range introducing over 50 new products.

articles.title: China Mobile seeks one-stop digital services package for enterprises
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: China Mobile introduced iSolutions, a one-stop digital services package for enterprises, at a promotional event in London. iSolutions is a toolkit bringing together network connections, 5G, cloud services, IoT, and AI. The event's theme emphasized co-creation and win-win partnerships.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 6 & Flip 6: One UI 8 Update Released!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is rolling out its One UI 8 update, built on Android 16, starting with the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6, incorporating AI-driven personalization, foldable-specific optimizations like improved multi-tasking and enhanced Flex Mode, and addressing security and new features demanded by users. The update will also be available for other Galaxy devices including the S24 series, A56 5G, and A36 5G.

articles.title: Xiaomi 17 with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, 7,000mAh battery launched: Price, specs and ...
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Xiaomi 17, which is the first device featuring Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. It has a 7,000mAh battery, LTPO OLED display, and IP68 rating. Pricing starts at 4,499 Yuan in China, with availability from September 27.

articles.title: Never Miss a Lead: LeadSuccess Debuts Lightning-Fast Lead Response Platform
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: LeadSuccess has launched a rapid lead-response and conversion platform that responds to web enquiries in as little as 88 seconds. The service promises to convert a significantly higher share of leads into real appointments. Early deployments have demonstrated conversion of up to 70% of contacted enquiries into booked appointments.

articles.title: Booker launches new-look digital platform
articles.author: Cara Houlton
articles.summary: Booker has launched a redesigned website and app offering a 'faster, smarter' digital experience. The platform includes features like visual shopping lists, personalized homepages, and improved ordering tools for retail and catering customers.

articles.title: Gordon's unveils Spritz Edition drinks to pair with prosecco
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Gordon's has launched Gordon's Spritz Edition, a new gin-based drink available in Strawberry & Passionfruit and Lime & Elderflower flavors.  The Spritz Edition (14.7% abv) is designed to be served with prosecco, and is currently available in Morrisons, with plans for wider rollout and an on-trade launch in the UK in 2026.

articles.title: Limited time deal: Walmart takes nearly $200 off Dyson's best-selling Big Ball Vacuum
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Walmart is having a sale on the Dyson Big Ball Turbinehead Canister Vacuum, reducing the price from $380 to $200. The Dyson vacuum features self-righting technology and a 360° articulation handle for easy cleaning.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 announced with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5: Design, specs and launch date to be revealed soon
articles.author: Debashis Sarkar
articles.summary: OnePlus has introduced the OnePlus 15, a new performance flagship smartphone featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Mobile Platform. It will be the first phone to feature the company's DetailMax image engine. More details, including specifications and launch timeline, will be announced later.

articles.title: James Van Der Beek : son bouleversant message pour les retrouvailles de Dawson's Creek
articles.author: Marzia Nicolini
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company utilizes an agency to target young parents or couples assumed to be wealthy and have a new child. This targets advertising within partner apps based on generated profiles.

articles.title: Middle aisle kitchen gadget will slash meal prep times for just £6
articles.author: James Moules
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a 'handy food chopper' in stores from October 2nd, designed to quickly chop onions and vegetables. The food chopper will be available in cool grey and blue color options. Dunelm has on sale 'Tell the Time' alarm clock for £8 – £27.

articles.title: New laundromat set to open at East Gun Hill Road
articles.author: Bronx Times
articles.summary: Mr. Cherry Laundromat is opening a new laundromat service at 901 E. Gun Hill Rd. in the Bronx.

articles.title: Kay Beauty Marks a Milestone with Space NK Debut
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Kay Beauty, co-founded by Katrina Kaif and Nykaa, launched in the UK at Space NK stores and online.  The brand's launch exceeded expectations, with certain lip products like Hydra Creme Lipstick performing exceptionally well.  Other top-performing products include the Kajal Eyeliner Duo, Matte Liquid Lipstick, Hydrating Foundation, Matte Drama Bullet Lipstick, and EyeKanvas Discover Eyeshadow Palettes.

articles.title: Xbox Ally pricing and preorders info coming today.
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft and Asus are launching the new Xbox Ally handhelds on October 16th. Pricing and preorder information are expected to be revealed later today, with Asus teasing preorders 'dropping soon'.

articles.title: 43 Things From Amazon That'll Have Your Button-Clicking Finger Racing To Hit "Add To Cart"
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Neutrogena launched Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30 that acts as both skin protection and skincare. Pink Stuff introduced "Sqeezy" sponge set for cleaning. First Aid Beauty released Facial Radiance Pads, compostable beauty prep pads. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder to absorb oil and blur pores. Skala launched Mais Cacho Hair 2-in-1 Conditioning Treatment for curly hair. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash. Aloderma launched Organic Aloe Vera Gel for the whole body. Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum. E.l.f. launched Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Clinique has Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Medicube launched Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer. I Dew Care launched dry shampoo powder. Oxo launched compact Brew Rapid Brewer.

articles.title: Sourgum Unveils Fresh Visual Identity for the Next Era of Modernized Waste and Recycling Services
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Sourgum launched a bold new brand, marking three years of growth, to continue driving the future of waste and recycling for residents, businesses, and haulers.

articles.title: Lightning Deal: These 'nice and crisp' headphones are 53% off ahead of October Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Soundcore by Anker launched the Q20i Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones. These headphones feature hybrid active noise cancelling, 40mm drivers with BassUp tech, and offer up to 60 hours of playtime.  Amazon Canada is offering major deals on these headphones.

articles.title: BUBS Sweetens Up the Big Apple with First-Ever U.S. Pop-Up in New York City
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: BUBS, a Swedish candy brand, is launching its first U.S. pop-up event called "Sweeteasy" in New York. This event offers fans a "Taste of Swedish Culture."

articles.title: Zoovu Launches Enhanced AI Shopping Assistant for Enterprise ECommerce
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zoovu has announced enhanced capabilities and increased availability for Zoe, its generative-AI shopping assistant. Zoe is designed to optimize ecommerce sales and is built on Zoovu's experience with AI-assisted shopping interactions.

articles.title: Arrive AI ($ARAI) Surpasses 1 Million Views on New to The Street TV Commercials
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Arrive AI (NASDAQ:ARAI) has surpassed 1 million views on its New to The Street TV commercials. This reflects the growing impact of NTTS's national broadcast and digital ecosystem.

articles.title: 29 Practical Things You Need As An Adult
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Built launched "Puff Protein Bars" which contain 17 grams of protein per bar. WD-40 introduced a WD-40 pen for precise application of lubricant and rust prevention. Howard Products launched Feed-N-Wax wood polish and conditioner to refresh and protect wooden fixtures.

articles.title: New laundromat set to open at East Gun Hill Road
articles.author: Ethan Marshall
articles.summary: Mr. Cherry Laundromat will soon open at 901 E. Gun Hill Rd. offering 24-hour service. It will also provide wash and fold and drop-off services. Additional parking is available for Cherry Valley Marketplace customers.

articles.title: Later Debuts Exciting New Features for Social Media Marketers During Quarterly Showcase "The Drop"
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Later, a social media management software company, announced a series of product enhancements to its platform. These new features aim to help marketers enhance creativity and drive impact with social media. The company will showcase these innovations in 'The Drop', a quarterly event for customers.

articles.title: Dyson is offering an insane deal on the V11 Extra cordless vacuum
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson has significantly reduced the price of its V11 Extra cordless vacuum from $659.99 to $449.99. The V11 Extra features up to 60 minutes of fade-free suction, a digital LED display, and specialized tools, making it suitable for whole-home cleaning on various floor types.

articles.title: Stanton Optical Expands to Fayetteville, NC
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Stanton Optical has opened a new location in Fayetteville, North Carolina, offering affordable and accessible eye care. The new store features same-day eye exams and glasses, with options like two pairs of glasses for $79. It expands Stanton Optical's presence and commitment to the North Carolina community, bringing its total store count to over 300 nationwide.

articles.title: The OnePlus 15 is on the way – here's why you'll want it
articles.author: Dan Grabham
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced the upcoming launch of its premium smartphone, the OnePlus 15, which will feature Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip. The OnePlus 15 will also include OnePlus's DetailMax image engine, replacing Hasselblad as a partner.

articles.title: Swap Unveils Agentic Infrastructure, Transforming the World Of Commerce
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Swap launched its Agentic Commerce Platform and AI Agent for Demand Planning. Swap's Agentic Commerce Platform provides brands with a Chat GPT-style storefront. The AI-Demand Planning solution offers advanced backend logistics tools.

articles.title: The Future of Alternative Industries Through the Eyes of an Entrepreneur
articles.author: Ben Williams
articles.summary: ProSnack, an FMCG company, focuses on creating convenient and well-thought-out products. They launched ready-to-eat meals like canned fish with grains and sturgeon preserves with rice or buckwheat. ProSnack also has nutrition product prototypes with full meal and modular capabilities, which could be launched in the future.

articles.title: I just discovered a SECRET way to snag luxury skincare for less - including bestsellers from Murad, Trilogy and more
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: iHerb is offering a 22% discount on luxury skincare products from brands like Fresh, Trilogy, and Murad for new shoppers using the code 29AVDAILYMAIL on orders of $60 or more until September 30th. Featured products include Fresh Rose Deep Hydration Oil, Trilogy Replenishing Night Cream, and Murad Resurgence Retinol Youth Renewal Serum, each highlighted for their ingredients and benefits.

articles.title: What is Aldi Original? What to know about Aldi switching up private label brand
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: Aldi is rebranding its private label products under a uniform 'Aldi' brand or with an 'Aldi Original' endorsement to increase recognizability for shoppers. This change, affecting over 90% of Aldi products, is being rolled out across its 2,500 stores nationwide over the next few years.

articles.title: Sourgum Unveils Fresh Visual Identity for the Next Era of Modernized Waste and Recycling Services
articles.author: Sourgum
articles.summary: Sourgum, a waste and recycling intelligence platform, launched new branding. The rebrand includes a modernized logo and improved user experience across digital touchpoints. This reflects the company's focus on delivering technology-driven waste and recycling services.

articles.title: Ninja slashes price of portable blender 'perfect for smoothies' to £40
articles.author: newsdesk@essexlive.news
articles.summary: Ninja is offering a discount on the Ninja Blast Portable Blender, reducing the price to £39.99. The blender features stainless steel blades, a leak-proof lid, and a USB-C rechargeable base. User reviews highlight its power and portability for making smoothies.

articles.title: Oppo F31 Pro Plus review: Dependable mid-ranger with solid build and long battery
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the F31 Pro Plus smartphone, emphasizing its durability with IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings, and its long-lasting 7,000mAh battery. The phone features a 6.79-inch AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, and comes in Gemstone Blue, Himalayan White and Festive Pink. Despite its durable build and battery life, the phone's camera performance is only mediocre.

articles.title: Samsung S25 FE model deal rivals Apple's iPhone 17 with £370 of free accessories
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, the latest addition to the Galaxy S25 series, which is available for purchase. The S25 FE features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a 12MP ultra-wide camera, a 50MP wide camera, 256GB of storage, and Galaxy AI functions, and is offered in multiple colors. Sky Mobile offers a launch deal that includes a Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 FE with a contract.

articles.title: Google's gen AI Search Live feature to launch in India soon
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Search Live is launching a mobile-first experience. The experience provides users with quick, real-time help.

articles.title: VisualGPT Expands AI-Powered Creativity Suite with New Background Remover and Image Upscaler
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: VisualGPT launched AI Background Remover and AI Image Upscaler to expand its AI-powered visualization platform. These new features enhance images and create professional visuals. VisualGPT aims to make world-class design tools accessible to everyone through these releases.

articles.title: What is Special About Chatbot Constructors for Creatio?
articles.author: Ollie Bale
articles.summary: Banza has launched the Chatbot Constructor for Creatio, a no-code solution for automating customer service and internal processes. This chatbot is designed for rapid deployment and easy customization across various channels like WhatsApp, Telegram, and Facebook Messenger, enabling businesses to quickly respond to customer inquiries and streamline operations. The Chatbot Constructor allows companies to improve customer experience while reducing workload on operators.

articles.title: Heron Foods prepares for Amble move with application for new licence
articles.author: Ian Smith
articles.summary: Heron Foods is relocating to a former Co-op store in Amble and seeking a premises license for the sale of alcohol. Newbiggin Golf Club is seeking a premises license to permit the supply of alcohol and provide recorded & live music & late night refreshment.

articles.title: BUBS Sweetens Up the Big Apple with First-Ever U.S. Pop-Up in New York City
articles.author: Orkla Snacks
articles.summary: BUBS, a Swedish candy brand, is launching in the U.S. The company is celebrating with a pop-up retail store called "Sweeteasy" in New York. The store introduces New Yorkers to the Swedish tradition of "lördagsgodis".

articles.title: REVIEW: New Hyundai Santa Fe is a brave step for the brand, and full of pleasant surprises
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Hyundai has launched the fifth-generation Santa Fe, featuring a bold new design, a spacious and luxurious interior, and a hybrid drivetrain. The new Santa Fe is Hyundai's first hybrid model offered locally, pairing a 1.6-litre turbopetrol engine with a 44kW electric motor for system outputs of 175kW and 367Nm.

articles.title: ‘It's gorgeous': Aldi launches new orange wine
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its Austrian Orange Wine, priced at £7.79 per 75cl bottle. This launch follows the success of Aldi's Rosorange drink. Wine expert Sam Caporn has praised the new wine for its flavor profile and balance.

articles.title: Comparing SSD External Storage: SDCard or MicroSD with Snapdragon 820 and SC735 Performance Insights
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: ADATA has launched two new external SSDs, the SD820 and the SC735. The SD820 is designed for outdoor use with read/write speeds up to 2000 MB/s and is IP68 certified. The SC735 features an ultra-lightweight design with a retractable USB connector.

articles.title: Yili Premium Milk Satine Debuts in Singapore, Offering High-quality Chinese Dairy to Southeast Asia
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Yili's premium liquid milk brand, Satine, debuted in Singapore, exceeding sales expectations. Other Yili products, including AMBPOMIAL Greek Style Yogurt, Youngfun milk beverage, Joyday and Cremo ice cream, and Westgold butter, continue to perform strongly. Yili is committed to growing its presence in the Southeast Asian market through product launches and community engagement.

articles.title: Yili Premium Milk Satine Debuts in Singapore, Offering High-quality Chinese Dairy to Southeast Asia
articles.summary: Yili has launched its Satine Premium Milk in Singapore. This launch introduces the high-quality Chinese dairy product to the Southeast Asian market.

articles.title: Yili Premium Milk Satine Debuts in Singapore, Offering High-quality Chinese Dairy to Southeast Asia
org: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
articles.summary: Yili's premium liquid milk brand, Satine, debuted in Singapore, introducing a new premium dairy option to local consumers. Satine has gained popularity and high repeat purchase rate, exceeding expectations. Besides Satine, Yili's other flagship products, such as AMBPOMIAL Greek Style Yogurt, Youngfun milk beverage, Joyday and Cremo ice cream, and Westgold butter continue to perform strongly in Singapore.

articles.title: The Best Face Moisturizers for Daily Hydration
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Nivea Soft is a lightweight cream containing Vitamin E, providing 24-hour moisture. Plum Saffron Glow Bright Moisturizer contains saffron and kumkumadi oil and provides SPF 35 sun protection. Olay Day Cream with SPF 15 is an anti-aging moisturizer that treats seven signs of aging. Dot & Key Vitamin C & E moisturizer helps fade dark spots and is suitable for oily skin types.

articles.title: Kanye West's Yeezy Season 10: The Next Era Of Streetwear
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Yeezy, Kanye West's brand, released its latest product drop. Following this release, Yeezy Season 10 (SZN X) will be introduced.

articles.title: advancreative Pioneers the Future of Industrial Marketing with Advanced HubSpot Automation Training
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Advancreative introduces a HubSpot automation training program for B2B marketing teams. This program focuses on building internal marketing capabilities, integrating advancreative's Marketing Rockstar Framework with HubSpot features like AI-powered lead nurturing and advanced segmentation. Early participants report higher engagement rates, lead reactivation success, and improved operational efficiency.

articles.title: 20% off White Stuff dress in five colours that's 'flattering on curves'
articles.author: mylondonnewsdesk@reachplc.com
articles.summary: White Stuff is offering a 20% discount on the Megan Long Sleeve Jersey Midi Dress, available in five colors and sizes 6-24. Hobbs offers the Harlie Jersey Dress, and Marks and Spencer offers the Ditsy Floral Ruched Midaxi Waisted Dress.

articles.title: Zong Unveils Bachat Bazar A One-Stop Shop of Affordable Bundles
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Zong, a technology innovation company in Pakistan, has launched its Bachat Bazar Campaign, which offers a suite of affordable bundles and special promotions. The campaign includes revamped pricing, with bundles starting from PKR 60, and exclusive deals, aiming to provide customers with flexibility, savings, and uninterrupted connectivity.

articles.title: Best Countertop Nugget Ice Makers: Ice Maker King Launches Comparison Tool for Buyers
articles.author: Ice Maker King.com
articles.summary: Ice Maker King launched a new online platform designed to help shoppers find the best countertop nugget ice makers and other top-rated ice machines. The platform offers advanced filtering, side-by-side comparisons, and curated collections to simplify the buying process for consumers.

articles.title: Stock AI, Reaches 113,000 AI-Generated Recipes as App Launch Nears
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Stock AI, an AI culinary platform, has created 113,000 unique recipes and is preparing to launch a mobile app.  The app aims to streamline the user experience, allowing users to easily create and save AI-generated recipes. This move positions Stock AI as a potential game-changer in digital cuisine by providing free access to a powerful culinary tool.

articles.title: Perion and Albertsons Media Collective to Unlock First-Party Retail Audiences Through High-Impact Display and DOOH Campaigns
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion Network and Albertsons Media Collective have partnered to launch an advertising solution. This solution leverages Albertsons Cos.' shopper data and Perion's high-impact display and DOOH formats. This new offering allows advertisers to reach over 100 million shoppers across more than 2,200 Albertsons stores.

articles.title: Affordable SEO Services Los Angeles – Smarter Solutions for Growth
articles.summary: Innovate Marketers delivers affordable SEO services in Los Angeles. Their data-driven approach optimizes websites and improves rankings for startups, small businesses, and enterprises. The services are customized to suit various budgets and goals to help businesses increase search visibility.

articles.title: 36 TikTok Products Everyone Needs To See
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Eos launched a limited-edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment and a Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil. Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream, while Capri Blue released a Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner. Laneige unveiled its Neo Blurring Powder, and Maybelline launched the Lifter Glaze Oil Balm.

articles.title: Spar shops across the North to sell new range of Lancashire sourdough as trend booms
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Clayton Park Bakery has launched six new sourdough bread lines in SPAR stores across Northern England owned by James Hall & Co. Ltd. The new sourdough lines include Half Sliced Sourdough Boule White, Half Sliced Sourdough Boule Malted Flake, Half Sliced Multi-seed with Sourdough Boule, Whole Unsliced Sourdough Boule White, Whole Unsliced Sourdough Boule Malted Flake, and White Farmhouse Loaf with Sourdough.

articles.title: Realme GT 8 Pro, iQOO 15, and 5 Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 powered phones ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Qualcomm unveiled the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, a new flagship mobile processor. The processor showcases a major performance boost over its predecessor. Smartphone brands are teasing their new phones containing the new processor.

articles.title: NIN Matching: 9mobile Launches Portal For Instant Verification
articles.author: Nairaland
articles.summary: 9mobile launched an intelligent online portal and a USSD option (2008#) in December 2020, enabling customers to instantly verify and link their National Identification Number (NIN) to their SIM cards. The portal allows subscribers to submit and verify their NIN without visiting physical centers, providing a seamless and stress-free experience as directed by the Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC).

articles.title: 'Magic' liquid with thousands of five-star reviews is 'miracle' for autumn outdoor cleaning
articles.author: Joanne Ridout
articles.summary: Wet and Forget Outdoor Cleaning Solution, priced at £29.45 for a 5-litre container, is praised by Amazon customers for effectively cleaning outdoor surfaces. Spear and Jackson spray and leave solution priced at £15.99 and Garden Gear Store offers the Electric Weed Sweeper, costing £39.99 are also available. These solutions offer alternatives to pressure washers for removing mould, lichen, and algae from patios, driveways, and other outdoor areas.

articles.title: Bold New Changes Are Coming to Your Favorite Aldi Products-Here's What to Know
articles.author: Nathan Hutsenpiller
articles.summary: Aldi is rebranding its nearly 90 in-house brands to just 26 under the new label "The Aldi Brand" in response to customer feedback. Some products will adopt fan-given nicknames, like Kirkwood frozen chicken nuggets now being called "Red Bag Chicken." The rebranding, which may take a couple of years to fully roll out, aims to consolidate Aldi's product line.

articles.title: Ahead of Time
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Supply offers the Single Edge Max Razor, an aluminum and zinc razor designed for minimal environmental impact. The razor utilizes small blades that last about a week each, and it comes with eight refill blades and a wall mount. It emphasizes great performance, design, and easy recyclability.

articles.title: Best AI Powered washing machines in 2025 adjusting wash cycles based on dirt level, load size, and fabric type
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: In 2025, several companies including LG, Samsung, Bosch, Haier, and IFB are launching new AI-powered washing machines. These washers utilize advanced AI technologies like AI Direct Drive, AI EcoBubble, AI Active Water Plus, and AI-DBT to optimize wash cycles based on fabric type, load size, and dirt level, offering features such as Wi-Fi connectivity, steam cleaning, and energy-saving modes.

articles.title: Honor X7d Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Honor announced the X7d smartphone on September 24, 2025. The 5G-ready phone features a 6.77-inch display, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 processor, 6GB of RAM, 128GB of storage, a 50MP dual-camera, and a 6500mAh battery with 35W wired charging.

articles.title: Proton Mail's redesigned mobile app is built for speed
articles.author: Will Shanklin
articles.summary: Proton Mail is rolling out new and updated mobile applications for Android and iOS. The updated mobile applications are rebuilt from the ground up to provide a cleaner, faster, and more private user experience. Proton first announced the revamp in April.

articles.title: 'Comfy and warm' New Balance trainers are half price but not for long
articles.author: cornwalllive@reachplc.com
articles.summary: New Balance has reduced the price of its WRPD Runner Shoes to £77.50. The WRPD Runner features a FuelCell midsole and knit upper. Additionally, Lulu Lemon is offering discounts on its Men's Cityverse Cotton Canvas Sneakers.

articles.title: Aldi branding changes will change how you find your favorite foods at their supermarkets
articles.author: David P. Willis
articles.summary: Aldi is updating its product packaging and branding in its largest-ever brand refresh, including launching its first-ever namesake brand. All Aldi-exclusive products will now feature either the Aldi brand name or the phrase "an Aldi Original." Some products will adopt popular shopper-given nicknames like "Red Bag Chicken."

articles.title: Google Is Bringing Android To PCs And Laptops: Should Windows Be Worried?
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Google and Qualcomm have confirmed that Android is coming to PCs, with a combined ChromeOS + Android platform expected.  The new Android for PC version will compete with Windows and complete Google's ecosystem play, which is expected at Google I/O 2026. It is designed to leverage the interface of Android and multitasking capabilities of ChromeOS.

articles.title: Clayton® Debuts TRU® ORIGIN Collection of Homes
articles.author: The Pilot News
articles.summary: The new TRU product line offers streamlined construction, quality, and attainability.

articles.title: New Balance's new 'troafer' team-up with Ganni is the most Marmite autumn shoe launch
articles.author: Daily Mirror
articles.summary: New Balance collaborates with GANNI to launch a new product called 'troafer'. The collaboration introduces a new footwear product to the market.

articles.title: How Local Businesses in Nagpur Can Use Social Media Tools to Grow Their Brand
articles.author: Nagpur News
articles.summary: The article introduces several free and affordable social media tools for local businesses, including Google My Business, Canva, Buffer, and Meta Business Suite. Google My Business creates a digital storefront, Canva helps with graphic design, Buffer schedules social media posts, and Meta Business Suite manages Facebook and Instagram presence, all aimed at improving marketing and audience engagement.

articles.title: Samsung launches the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite in Israel
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite in Israel. The new tablet features an S Pen, SmartThings support, and AI-based tools.

articles.title: SUBARU OF AMERICA ANNOUNCES PRICING ON 2026 SUBARU BRZ
articles.author: Morgan Citizen
articles.summary: Subaru is launching the new 2026 BRZ Series.Yellow, featuring a "Sunrise Yellow" exterior and matte black wheel finishes. The BRZ Limited and BRZ tS are priced similarly to previous models. The BRZ Premium level has been discontinued.

articles.title: The next chapter in wearable tech
articles.summary: Fire-Boltt has launched FireLens, India’s first AI-powered smart eyewear featuring an 8MP camera, dual AI engines, and directional audio. The product is designed to offer a hands-free, ambient relationship with technology by integrating seamlessly into daily routines. FireLens is available now on fireboltt.com & Flipkart.

articles.title: Trillet.ai Launches Smart Voice Agents to Redefine Sales Follow-Ups
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Trillet AI has launched Smart Voice Agents, an AI-driven platform designed to automate sales follow-ups, callbacks, and outbound call operations. The platform aims to help businesses maximize sales efficiency and improve customer engagement by ensuring timely and intelligent follow-ups across multiple communication channels.

articles.title: Bahrain Chamber launches e-application and digital assistant ‘Issa'
articles.author: The Daily Tribune
org: Bahrain Chamber of Commerce and Industry
articles.summary: The Bahrain Chamber of Commerce and Industry introduced a new e-application and digital assistant named 'Issa'. This launch is intended to improve services and enhance member experience.

articles.title: The stinky truth about modern deodorant – and why doctors are worried
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Personal hygiene companies are introducing all-body sprays to the market.

articles.title: HONOR X9d 5G 'dominates' with unmatched durability and performance
articles.summary: HONOR launched the X9d 5G smartphone, emphasizing its durability with features like SGS Triple Resistant Premium Performance Certification and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2. The HONOR X9d 5G has an 8,300mAh battery and offers 66W HONOR SuperCharge. Pre-orders come with freebies, including an HONOR Pad X7 tablet.

articles.title: POCO launches two power-packed smartphones in Nigeria: POCO M7 and POCO C85
articles.author: BI Africa
articles.summary: POCO has launched two new smartphones, the POCO M7 and POCO C85, in Nigeria. The POCO M7 features a 7000mAh battery, a 6.9" FHD+ display, and a 50MP AI dual camera, while the POCO C85 comes with a 6000mAh battery, a 6.9" display, and a 50MP AI dual camera. Both models are now available at authorized POCO retailers and online through Jumia.com.

articles.title: ​Beauty comes from within. But it starts with the outer packaging
articles.author: Amcor Flexibles
articles.summary: Amcor introduces innovative packaging solutions, including Infinity™ jars showcasing transparency, AmPrima™ mono-material recyclable film, and Prima refill for sustainable dispensers. These solutions address the beauty industry's need for sustainability and e-commerce durability, with Amcor providing testing labs to certify e-commerce packaging.

articles.title: I love my robot hoover, Helen. She has shortcomings but she'd never show me an ad
articles.summary: Samsung launched a pilot program in the US for its 'Family Hub' fridges. The program displays ads on the fridge screens when the doors are idle, introducing a new service to customers.

articles.title: Google Launches AI-Powered Mood Board App Mixboard: 5 Reasons Why Its Better Than Pinterest
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Google Labs has launched Mixboard, an experimental AI-powered mood board app that uses AI to generate original visuals from text prompts. Mixboard is designed for creative applications like home decor planning, event themes, product development, and DIY projects, offering features such as natural language editing, context-aware text generation, and one-click creative variations.

articles.title: This interactive AI-generated podcast app from ex-Googlers blew my mind
articles.author: Let's be
articles.summary: Huxe launched a new cross-platform, audio-centric news app that delivers personalized news updates based on user interests. The app offers features like on-demand podcasts, interactive questioning of news segments, and custom live stations. Huxe is available on Android and iOS, offering a unique and interactive news consumption experience.

articles.title: Vitafoams Subsidiary, Vitavisco to Unveil New Product
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Vitavisco, a subsidiary of Vitafoams, is set to unveil a new product. The full details are available by clicking a provided link.

articles.title: Natural Nine Accelerates Global Expansion with Upcoming Product Launch
articles.summary: Natural Nine is planning to launch a new product designed to minimize skin irritation with a foam-type formula for easier application, targeting a wider consumer base and expansion into overseas markets. The new product will be made with EWG Green Grade ingredients and developed under strict quality standards.

articles.title: Cleverus Unveils New Brand Identity, Website and SEO2.0 Strategy Amid Evolving AI Search Landscape
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Cleverus has introduced SEO2.0 (Search Everywhere Optimization), a comprehensive approach extending beyond traditional search engines to encompass AI-powered search tools, including Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) and Answer Engine Optimization (AEO). Additionally, Cleverus launched a redesigned website to provide a more intuitive user experience featuring improved navigation and insights into their AI-powered SEO services.

articles.title: Sundae Body hair mists and new body whips land at Boots
articles.author: Freelance Journalist
articles.summary: Sundae Body has launched new hair and body mists and added Velvety Vanilla and Birthday Cake to their Body Whip range, available at Boots with special offers. Simple is offering a 3-month free trial of their Wall Pilates app, which includes personalized workout plans and nutrition coaching.

articles.title: Sundae Body hair mists and new body whips land at Boots
articles.author: Freelance Journalist
articles.summary: Sundae Body launched new dual-purpose hair and body mists and two new additions to its Body Whip range at Boots. Simple App is offering a Wall Pilates challenge with 3 months free. MySweetSmile is having a back-to-school sale with 30% off teeth whitening kits.

articles.title: Over half of the US describe having disastrous customer care experiences, new study reveals
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Quant has launched a new agentic AI agent designed to resolve customer queries instantly. It resolves nearly 77% of customer issues, delivering answers in under five seconds and has been rolled out with global brands for tasks such as rerouting lost bags and processing restaurant orders. The system even scored higher than human agents on customer satisfaction.

articles.title: LG Electronics launches new TV with improved accessibility for seniors
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: On Thursday, LG Electronics Inc. unveiled a new TV.

articles.title: Best-selling Brunae Body tanning brand known for ‘delivering real results' launches Ultra Dark Self-Tanning Mousse and Face Tan Serum
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Brunae Body has launched a new Self Tanning Range featuring the Ultra Dark Self-Tanning Mousse and Face Tan Serum. These products blend skincare ingredients like niacinamide and hyaluronic acid with natural DHA, offering a natural, bronzed glow. The range emphasizes clean, vegan-friendly formulas designed to hydrate and support the skin's barrier while tanning.

articles.title: Oppo F31 Pro+ review: Durable mid-range phone with smooth performance
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Oppo launched a new line of products earlier this month.

articles.title: 'It's not the Pokemon you grew up playing. It's a whole lot more fun'
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching Pokemon Legends Z-A on October 16, featuring real-time battles instead of turn-based combat. The game introduces a new gameplay experience where players can move their trainer and strategically position their Pokemon during battles. The game is enhanced for Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: 'This $7 hair oil saved my damaged hair after one wash.'
articles.author: Amy Clark
articles.summary: ALDI introduced an argan oil hair product priced at $6.99. The product's packaging is similar to OGX's Renewing Moroccan Argan Oil, while the texture and scent are reminiscent of MOROCCANOIL Original Oil Treatment.  Reviewers found the ALDI hair oil effective, leaving hair shiny, soft, and manageable with less frizz.

articles.title: Beard Papa's World-Famous Cream Puff Chain Opens New Location in San Diego October 4th, 2025!
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Beard Papa's, a Japanese dessert brand, is opening its first San Diego location on October 4th and 5th. The opening menu will feature popular cream puff shells like Original, Chocolate, Oreo™, and Matcha, paired with the brand's signature Vanilla Bean custard filling. The company is also offering promotions and sweepstakes to celebrate the grand opening.

articles.title: 35 Bedroom Upgrades If You Plan To Hibernate There
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article showcases various new products designed to enhance home comfort and ambiance. These include items like privacy window film, plush blankets, digital alarm clocks, and specialized pillows, aimed at providing comfort, style, and convenience. Additionally, the article features items like organizers, lighting solutions, and even a Vintage Bookshelf Edition of Candy Land, catering to both functionality and entertainment.

articles.title: Qualcomm announces Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme and X2 Elite for Next-Gen Windows PCs
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Qualcomm has introduced two new products: the Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme and Snapdragon X2 Elite, built for premium Windows 11 PCs. The Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme is designed for users with advanced computing demands, while the Snapdragon X2 Elite offers a balance of performance and efficiency. Devices powered by these platforms are expected to be available in the first half of 2026.

articles.title: China's Leapmotor hits 1-million production milestone
articles.author: Li Fusheng
articles.summary: Leapmotor, a Chinese NEV maker, has produced its one-millionth car, achieving this milestone only 343 days after reaching 500,000 units. The company delivered over 320,000 vehicles in the first eight months of 2025 and is expanding internationally, leveraging Stellantis's distribution network to penetrate over 30 overseas markets.

articles.title: AI Is Democratizing Strategy- And Creating Savings For Consumers
articles.author: Jaime Catmull
articles.summary: Waldo has released Waldo 3.0, its latest AI-powered platform update, which includes features that enable teams to monitor trends and gain actionable insights. This platform is designed to streamline creative strategy, speed up product launches, and provide competitive advantages for brands and marketing teams. According to Tracey Faux-Pattani, CEO of BSSP, the platform has saved approximately 17,000 hours of tedious research, improving overall efficiency.

articles.title: YEEDI launches S20 Infinity: Unbeatable Battery Life Meets Evolved Cleaning Technology
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: YEEDI has launched the S20 Infinity, a smart cleaning device engineered for large homes and complex surfaces. This device aims to provide convenience in a market crowded with smart cleaning devices.

articles.title: Sony unleashes another limited edition DualSense with the God of War 20th Anniversary model – ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Sony released a new God of War 20th Anniversary Limited Edition DualSense controller. The controller features a Kratos-inspired design.

articles.title: Universal Product Catalog: What it means for shoppers in the UAE
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: GS1 launched the Universal Product Catalog (UPC). The UPC service aims to provide accurate, verified product information. This service is intended to increase efficiency, transparency, and consumer confidence.

articles.title: Xiaomi Launches New Flagship Smartphones Featuring Dual Displays and 7000mAh Batteries
articles.author: Pravda
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched its new flagship 17 series smartphones in China, including the Xiaomi 17, 17 Pro, and 17 Pro Max. These devices showcase significant upgrades in processing power, display technology, and camera systems.

articles.title: Qualcomm's Kedar Kondap on Snapdragon X2 Elite, ‘Extreme', Guardian And What's Next
articles.author: Sahil Mohan Gupta
articles.summary: Qualcomm launched its new Snapdragon X2 Elite and X2 Elite Extreme chips, designed to improve multi-core performance, battery life, and on-device AI capabilities in Windows on Arm devices. The company also unveiled Snapdragon Guardian for enterprise-grade remote management. Gaming support has been enhanced through partnerships and optimizations, with games like Fortnite now available on Snapdragon.
